hopobject.body:
BeagleBoard.org Logo Program

To best enable collaboration within the community, the BeagleBoard.org Foundation will license logos to suitable manufacturers looking to advance solutions for participants within the community. We seek to hold our licensed manufacturers to high quality, reliability and ethical standards. Please contact Christine Long with any questions regarding our existing partners or to become a partner.

There are currently four (4) different levels of logo licenses:

  1. Manufacturer - Licensed to manufacture and sell approved BeagleBoard.org products
  2. Compliant - Licensed to manufacture and sell clones of approved designs under their own brand, but following the BeagleBoard.org specifications
  3. Compatible - Licensed to manufacture and sell approved derivatives of BeagleBoard.org products under their own brand that run the community software and otherwise be have in a compatible manner where possible
  4. Approved - Licensed to manufacture and sell approved products claiming some role in the BeagleBoard.org community and ecosystem under their own brand

BeagleBoard.org Manufacturing Partners

The product bearing the BeagleBoard.org Logo is an official product of BeagleBoard.org.

Current "BeagleBoard.org" manufacturing partner(s):

  • Element14 is licensed to utilize the BeagleBoard.org logo when they manufacture BeagleBone Black.
  • GHI Electronics is licensed to utilize the BeagleBoard.org logo when they manufacture BeagleBone Black.
  • Embedded Product Design is licensed to utilize the BeagleBoard.org logo when they manufacture BeagleBoard-X15.
  • CircuitCo Printed Circuit Board Solutions is licensed to utilize the BeagleBoard.org logo when they manufacture BeagleBoard, BeagleBoard-xM, BeagleBone or BeagleBone Black (for purchase orders placed before June 17, 2016).

BeagleBoard Compliant

The product bearing the BeagleBoard Compliant Logo has been tested by BeagleBoard.org and has been determined to be BeagleBoard Compliant. “BeagleBoard Compliant” is defined as a product that (a) is identical in technical design and functionality as the specified BeagleBoard.org product with which this product is compliant, and (b) runs on the version of the software provided by BeagleBoard.org to supplier. A product shall be deemed “BeagleBoard Compliant” as of the manufacture date. If additional peripherals are bundled with the supplier’s product, the “BeagleBoard Compliant” certification does not extend to those peripherals.

This product may include other accessories and the applicability for use with this product is the sole responsibility of the supplier.

General support for this board is available from the BeagleBoard.org community. All hardware support for this product is the responsibility of the supplier. Return merchandise authorization support is provided by the supplier and access to this is provided by the supplier via its website.

The quality and the manufacture of products compliant with this Agreement are the sole responsibility of the supplier of this product and BeagleBoard.org bears no responsibility for the inability of the supplier of this product either to maintain this compliancy or to the quality of the product. BeagleBoard.org will make every effort to insure the continued compliance of this product by working with and supporting the supplier to the extent the supplier wishes to do so.

Current "beagleboard compliant" logo licensee(s):

  • Element14 BeagleBone Black
  • Arrow BeagleBone Black

BeagleBoard Compatible

The product bearing the BeagleBoard Compatible Logo has been tested by BeagleBoard.org and has been determined to be BeagleBoard Compatible. "BeagleBoard Compatible" is defined as a product that (a) runs on the version of the software provided by BeagleBoard.org to supplier, (b) said software also runs on a BeagleBoard.org product, and (c) releases open hardware design materials. A product shall be deemed “BeagleBoard Compatible” as of the manufacture date.

This product may include other accessories and the applicability for use with this product is the sole responsibility of the supplier.

General support for this board is available from the BeagleBoard.org community. All hardware support for this product is the responsibility of the supplier. Return merchandise authorization support is provided by the supplier and access to this is provided by the supplier via its website.

The quality and the manufacture of products compliant with this Agreement are the sole responsibility of the supplier of this product and BeagleBoard.org bears no responsibility for the inability of the supplier of this product either to maintain this compliancy or to the quality of the product. BeagleBoard.org will make every effort to insure the continued compliance of this product by working with and supporting the supplier to the extent the supplier wishes to do so.

Current "beagleboard compatible" logo licensee(s):

  • SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green
  • SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green Wireless
  • SanCloud BeagleBone Enhanced
  • element14 BeagleBone Black Industrial
  • Arrow BeagleBone Black Industrial
  • Mentorel BeagleBone uSomIQ

EEPROM database

One element of compatibility is an entry in our EEPROM database recorded in a Github-hosted readme.md file.

BeagleBoard.org Approved

See beagleboard.org/approved for terms and list of approved products.
